comment.author: 99497842@N07
comment._content: Is the building on the front left the Morrison College on top of Morrison Hill ?

comment.author: 99547520@N04
comment._content: No. I think it is Flagstaff House in Central.

comment.author: 61013804@N08
comment._content: No I think it is the Government House. This appearance is different from old photos of Flagstaff House, which is also very close to the city below. (ref City of Victoria 2nd ed 1999, p.14 view from Flagstaff House)

comment.author: 61013804@N08
comment._content: No, I think it is the Government House. The outward appearance of Flagstaff House is different. Also it is close to the city below (ref City of Victoria 2nd ed 1999 p.14 view from Flagstaff House)
